title: In touch with the world
creator_credit: Basic Films, Central Office of Information, Leon Clore and John Fletcher
brief_description: Made in 1964 for the General Post Office in Great Britain this documentary features the employees and their work, such as night postal sorters, a postman on his delivery round, telephone operators, clerical and management staff. The accomplished cinematography by Manny Wynn is complemented by James Harpham’s original music composition.
